channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Yikes! 70% of you told me you’re not hyped about the Galaxy S26 — Samsung better have something special up its sleeve
item.description: You’re not feeling the hype for the Samsung Galaxy S26 – maybe it’s time for a change.

item.title: Want to lock in a low-cost NBN plan for a full year? I’ve found 3 providers offering just that – save up to AU$240
item.description: 12-month discounts on NBN plans are rare, but you can definitely find extra savings if you know where to look – and I've found 3 providers worth considering.

item.title: BMW doubles down on divisive car subscription features – but admits its 'heated seats' furore was a mistake
item.description: BMW will continue to offer features via subscription, despite a very public backlash against its heated seats

item.title: Watch a garage-built drone hit 430mph – the new (unofficial) fastest drone on earth
item.description: A garage-built aircraft worth about $3,000 just broke the world drone speed record – but it's not officially recognized by Guinness.

item.title: HBO is turning Baldur’s Gate into a TV show
item.description: HBO is developing a Baldur's Gate TV show that will continue the story of Larian Studios' hit RPG Baldur's Gate 3, according to Deadline. The Last Of Us co-creator Craig Mazin will serve as the show's creator, writer, executive producer, and showrunner. While it's set to feature new protagonists, the plan is for existing characters […]
